title: Tales of the Minivandians
description: "The Minivandian is the warrior who values his home and hearth. He goes through the mundane day to day things with an eye to the adventures that they contain. She is the barbarian queen who fights the monsters of everyday tasks. These are their stories."Tales of the Minivandians is a collection of short stories about how a modern day barbarian deals with the trials of life. They are stories of family, life, humor, and love.
author: Tom Rogneby
